text: Vadim Gennadyevich Pomazov (; born 5 July 1968 in Yaroslavl) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Sportspeople from Yaroslavl Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Spartak Kostroma players Category:FC Dynamo Moscow reserves players Category:FC Shinnik Yaroslavl players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Yugra Nizhnevartovsk players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Vadim Pomazov
